import axios from "axios"; import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import Swal from "sweetalert2"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Workout() { const [name,setexercisename]= useState(''); const [email,setsets]= useState(''); const [reps,setreps]= useState(''); const [workout,setworkout]= useState(''); const [message,setmessage]= useState(''); const workoutrecord = () => { if(name == "") { Swal.fire({ title: "Validation Message", text: "Name Field is Required*", icon: "wrong" }); } else if(email == "") { Swal.fire({ title: "Validation Message", text: "Email Field is Required*", icon: "wrong" }); } else if(date === "") { Swal.fire({ title: "Validation Message", text: "Date Field is Required*", icon: "wrong" }); } else if(workout == "") { Swal.fire({ title: "Validation Message", text: "Workout Field is Required*", icon: "wrong" }); } else if(message == "") { Swal.fire({ title: "Validation Message", text: "Message Field is Required*", icon: "wrong" }); } else( axios.post('http://localhost:4000/workout',{name,email,date,workout,message}) ) } return(
